description: TOP CLASS Situated in the Molise region, a natural paradise with the perfect conditions for growing wheat, La Molisana creates pasta with exceptional characteristics.
name: Penne Boscaiola Bake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g La Molisana Pastificio Extra Di Lusso Penne Rigate No 20
2 pkt 200g punnets swiss brown mushrooms, thickly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta according to packet instructions. Drain, reserving fl cup cooking liquid.
Meanwhile, heat oil in a large 26cm cast-iron saute pan over medium heat. Cook onion and garlic for 5 minutes, stirring, or until onion has softened.
Add pancetta, mushroom, butter and half of the thyme, then cook for 10 minutes, stirring, or until mushroom is tender. Remove pan from heat.

Preheat grill to high. Add parmesan, cream, reserved cooking liquid and pasta, then stir to combine. Sprinkle with mozzarella. Grill for 10 minutes or until mozzarella is golden. Serve scattered with remaining thyme.
